rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ETW2410} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: This unit introduces students to a wide range of contemporary financial econometric techniques which are commonly utilised in the financial data analysis. Topics covered include the random walk model, volatility and risk modelling, and several symmetric and asymmetric univariate volatility models. Also, this unit will expose students to applications of econometric analysis in the multivariate asset pricing models, portfolio selection and performance analysis, and volatility transmissions between markets and assets.
